com.google.cloud.compute

Class AttachedDisk.CreateDiskConfiguration.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.cloud.compute.AttachedDisk.CreateDiskConfiguration.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    AttachedDisk.CreateDiskConfiguration

    public static final class AttachedDisk.CreateDiskConfiguration.Builder
extends Object
    A builder for CreateDiskConfiguration objects.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AttachedDisk.CreateDiskConfiguration build()
      Creates a CreateDiskConfiguration object.
      AttachedDisk.CreateDiskConfiguration.Builder setAutoDelete(Boolean autoDelete)
      Sets whether the disk should auto-delete when the instance to which it's attached is deleted.
      AttachedDisk.CreateDiskConfiguration.Builder setDiskName(String diskName)
      Sets the name to be assigned to the disk.
      AttachedDisk.CreateDiskConfiguration.Builder setDiskSizeGb(Long diskSizeGb)
      Sets the size of the persistent disk, in GB.
      AttachedDisk.CreateDiskConfiguration.Builder setDiskType(DiskTypeId diskType)
      Sets the identity of the disk type.
      AttachedDisk.CreateDiskConfiguration.Builder setSourceImage(ImageId sourceImage)
      Sets the identity of the source image used to create the disk.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • setDiskName

        public AttachedDisk.CreateDiskConfiguration.Builder setDiskName(String diskName)
        Sets the name to be assigned to the disk. If not specified, the disk is given the instance's name.

      • setDiskType

        public AttachedDisk.CreateDiskConfiguration.Builder setDiskType(DiskTypeId diskType)
        Sets the identity of the disk type. If not specified, pd-standard is used.

      • setDiskSizeGb

        public AttachedDisk.CreateDiskConfiguration.Builder setDiskSizeGb(Long diskSizeGb)
        Sets the size of the persistent disk, in GB. If not set the disk will have the size of the source image. This value can be larger than the image's size. If the provided size is smaller than the image's size, then instance creation will fail.

      • setSourceImage

        public AttachedDisk.CreateDiskConfiguration.Builder setSourceImage(ImageId sourceImage)
        Sets the identity of the source image used to create the disk.

      • setAutoDelete

        public AttachedDisk.CreateDiskConfiguration.Builder setAutoDelete(Boolean autoDelete)
        Sets whether the disk should auto-delete when the instance to which it's attached is deleted. If not specified, the disk is not deleted automatically.

      • build

        public AttachedDisk.CreateDiskConfiguration build()
        Creates a CreateDiskConfiguration object.
